hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # 11th of the month. 3x per year = Apr Aug Dec #H H 11 4,8,12 * H H 11 10,2,6 *

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors ### This will overwrite any current download request. ### Run this once ONLY every harvest per taxon group. php5.6 gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"send_download_request", "taxon":"Animalia"}' php5.6 gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"send_download_request", "taxon":"Plantae"}' php5.6 gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"send_download_request", "taxon":"Other7Groups"}'
### Will wait for a day to check if downloads are ready sleep 24h
### This will generate the .sh file if download is ready. ### The .sh file is the curl command to download. php5.6 gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_sh_file", "taxon":"Animalia"}' php5.6 gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_sh_file", "taxon":"Plantae"}' php5.6 gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_sh_file", "taxon":"Other7Groups"}'
### This will check if all downloads are ready php5.6 gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"check_if_all_downloads_are_ready_YN"}'
